title: The Muppet Show
short_plot_summary: The Muppets and their wacky friends put on a variety show filled with music, comedy, and special guest stars.
explanation: A frog, representing the main character and host, Kermit the Frog
A pig, symbolizing another key character, Miss Piggy
A bear, for Fozzie Bear, the show's resident comedian
A saxophone, portraying the musical aspect of the show
Theater masks, representing the show's format as a variety show and its theatrical performances
